title: Raised Bed Garden. Learn as you grow

subtasks: Planting tomatoes, beans, cucumbers, spinach, broccoli, and spearmint in raised beds
Covering plants with protection during cold weather
Thinning out plants to allow proper growth
Preparing raised beds with materials like roof tin, light stain, and plastic
Learning from previous experiences and adapting techniques
Thanking the spouse for encouragement and assistance

tasks.task: Maintenance and Improvement of Gardening Spaces
subtasks: Acquiring and installing wood and bricks for garden beds
Beveling and staining metal components (e.g., roof tin) for aesthetic and functional purposes
Managing pests (e.g., worms affecting cucumbers)
Protecting plants from extreme cold (e.g., covering with covers when temperatures reach 20 degrees)
Documenting learning journey and sharing experiences
Setting personal goals related to self-sufficiency and healthy living
